title: Dentist Booking App
content: A user can select preferred date,time slot, services offered and then fill a form with their information to book appointment. data is sent to a spring boot backend and stored in a postgreSQL database

title: Non profit Donation web App
content: A Donation Website i built for a friends non profit foundation. This web app is integrated with the Stripe API. A user is able to make donations of any amount. NodeJs(express) handles the server side integration.

title: Hybrid Blog App
content: This App started as just a simple App to post and track my problem solving(leetcode, hackerrank) journey, but it ended being a hybrid app , where i post articles about coding , some of the projects i have worked on and some of the problems i have solved, all in seperate pages

title: Location Pinning App
content: A simple App integrated with react-map-gl which allows a user to drop pins on maps. saved data( user, pins) is stored in a mongo db database
